plot: What if the characters we create while painting or writing could live a life as we know it - beyond the pages they are traditionally confined to? Think Frankenstein meets Pinocchio meets the creation of Adam.
title: Aubergine
plot_es: What if the characters we create while painting or writing could live a life as we know it - beyond the pages they are traditionally confined to? Think Frankenstein meets Pinocchio meets the creation of Adam.
plot_en: What if the characters we create while painting or writing could live a life as we know it - beyond the pages they are traditionally confined to? Think Frankenstein meets Pinocchio meets the creation of Adam.
